price: 213 Garde-toi donc d’invoquer avec Allah d’autres divinités, car tu subirais le même sort que ceux qui seront châtiés.
arabic: فَلَا تَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُعَذَّبِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: falā tadʿu maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fatakūna mina al-muʿadhabīna
